thread.title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd Celebrate Their Love With Jellyfish
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd Celebrate Their Love With Jellyfish

title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd Celebrate Their Love With Jellyfish
text:
— Ripley's Aqua Canada (@RipleysAquaCA) September 1, 2016 Most Popular Former Jelena fanboy Drake liked the Weeknd's aquarium shot in approval. Drake, aka champagnepapi on Insta, leaves his mark. Instagram That wasn't The Weeknd and Gomez's only extravagant date in Canada either: Tesfaye also rented out the entire VIP section of a movie theater so the two could see Get Out Thursday night. It's a move straight from Selena Gomez's ex (and fellow Canadian) Justin Bieber's playbook. Bieber went bigger and rented out the Staples Center in L.A. so he and Gomez could watch Titanic over dinner way back in 2011. Gomez and Tesfaye spent Thursday together before Gomez flew to New York on Friday to shoot a campaign for Coach. [Video]: Selena in Coach’s Instagram Story. [Part 1] pic.twitter.com/pusT1zJjGo 
— Selena Gomez News (@LifeWithSelG) March 17, 2017 Advertisement   A post shared by Stuart Vevers (@stuartvevers) on Mar 17, 2017 at 5:10pm PDT New picture of Selena with a fan in New York City yesterday! pic.twitter.com/cnIqVzTheC 
— Selena Gomez News (@LifeWithSelG) March 18, 2017 She was back in Toronto on Saturday, when the two had their aquarium date. Fans believe Gomez flew back to L.A. Sunday for a friend's 25th birthday party. A post shared by Selena & Justin Updates™ (@jelenasenergy) on Mar 19, 2017 at 7:00pm PDT A post shared by Selena & Justin Updates™ (@jelenasenergy) on Mar 19, 2017 at 7:53pm PDT Tesfaye, meanwhile, kicks off the South American leg of his tour which runs March 23 to April 2—whether that's time apart or another vacation together , only their Instagrams will tell.
